name: Petz: Catz 2
summary: Petz: Catz 2, known in Japan as Nyanko to Mahou no Boushi and in Europe as simply Catz, is an adventure game developed by Yuke's for the Nintendo Wii and PlayStation 2 consoles, published and released by Ubisoft in 2007. It is a spiritual successor to THE DOG Island, in which the player controls a young kitten on a quest to save the world and retrieve the titular Magic Hat back from the evil wolf, Ivlet.
